arguments.value: Only the contract owner can call

deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@title CertificateRegistry
 @dev Manages the secure registration and verification of student certificate hashes on the blockchain.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the contract owner can call this function."

arguments.value: Only the contract owner can call this function.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the contract owner can call this function."

devdoc.details: Manages the secure registration and verification of student certificate hashes on the blockchain.

getCertificateDetails(bytes32).details: Retrieves all stored details for a specific certificate hash.

params._certificateHash: The SHA-256 hash of the certificate.

returns.isValid: The current validity status (always true if registered).
returns.issuer: The address that issued the certificate.
returns.studentId: The off-chain ID of the student.

issueCertificate(bytes32,string).details: Issues a new certificate by storing its hash and student ID on the blockchain. The hash must be generated off-chain from the content of the PDF certificate.

params._certificateHash: The SHA-256 hash of the certificate PDF (prefixed with 0x).
params._studentId: The unique identifier of the student.

verifyCertificate(bytes32).details: Checks if a certificate hash is registered (i.e., valid) by checking the issuer address.

devdoc.title: CertificateRegistry
